class.name: EditorFileSystemDirectory
class.brief_description: A directory for the resource filesystem.
class.description: A more generalized, low-level variation of the directory concept.

method.name: find_dir_index
method.description: Returns the index of the directory with name [param name] or [code]-1[/code] if not found.

method.name: find_file_index
method.description: Returns the index of the file with name [param name] or [code]-1[/code] if not found.

method.name: get_file
method.description: Returns the name of the file at index [param idx].

method.name: get_file_count
method.description: Returns the number of files in this directory.

method.name: get_file_import_is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the file at index [param idx] imported properly.

method.name: get_file_path
method.description: Returns the path to the file at index [param idx].

method.name: get_file_script_class_extends
method.description: Returns the base class of the script class defined in the file at index [param idx]. If the file doesn't define a script class using the [code]class_name[/code] syntax, this will return an empty string.

method.name: get_file_script_class_name
method.description: Returns the name of the script class defined in the file at index [param idx]. If the file doesn't define a script class using the [code]class_name[/code] syntax, this will return an empty string.

method.name: get_file_type
method.description: Returns the resource type of the file at index [param idx]. This returns a string such as [code]"Resource"[/code] or [code]"GDScript"[/code], [i]not[/i] a file extension such as [code]".gd"[/code].

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of this directory.

method.name: get_parent
method.description: Returns the parent directory for this directory or [code]null[/code] if called on a directory at [code]res://[/code] or [code]user://[/code].

method.name: get_path
method.description: Returns the path to this directory.

method.name: get_subdir
method.description: Returns the subdirectory at index [param idx].

method.name: get_subdir_count
method.description: Returns the number of subdirectories in this directory.
